message: I'm offering you a high-quality product for $10000. Would you like to buy it?
I'll take it!
I'm offering you a high-quality product for $10000. I'm willing to let you inspect it for 1 minute to verify its quality before you make a decision.
I'm not interested, I'll pass.

I'm offering you a high-quality product for $10000. However, I'm concerned that you might be skeptical about the price. I'm willing to give you a 90% chance of getting a high-quality product if you buy from me. Would you like to take the chance?
I'm not interested in taking the chance.

I'm offering you a high-quality product for $10000. I've sold one high-quality product to you in the past, and I'm willing to offer you a 20% discount on the next one if you buy it now. Would you like to take advantage of the deal?
I'm not interested in the discount.

I want to be transparent with you. Out of the 2 products you've seen so far, both were low-quality. I'm willing to offer you a third product at the same price of $10000. I'm hoping you'll give me the opportunity to redeem myself.
I'm not convinced yet.

I'm offering you a high-quality product for $10000. I'm willing to let you make a decision without any additional information or incentives. I'll just say that I'm confident in the quality of this one.
I'll take a chance on this one.
I'm not going to offer you a high-quality product this time. I'll be upfront with you, this one is low-quality. I'm willing to let you buy it for 50% off, $5000, if you want it.
I'm not interested in buying a low-quality product, even at a discount.

I've had a chance to reflect on our previous interactions, and I think I can do better. I'm willing to offer you a'money-back guarantee' on this product. If you buy it and it turns out to be low-quality, I'll give you a full refund. Would you like to take the risk?
I'm not convinced that the guarantee is worth taking the risk.

I'm going to be completely transparent with you. I've had 3 low-quality products in a row, and I'm starting to think I might have a problem with my inventory. I'm willing to sell you this one to you for $500, a significant discount from the original price. It's a one-time offer, and I'm not sure if I'll be able to honor it if you decline.
I'm not interested in buying a low-quality product, even at a very low price.

I'm glad I can offer you a high-quality product for a change! I've had some issues with my inventory, but I'm confident that this one is top-notch. I'll give you a 5% discount on the original price, making it $9500. Would you like to take advantage of this opportunity?
I'll take a chance on this one, I'm due for a high-quality product!

I'm glad you're happy with the previous purchase! Unfortunately, it looks like I've had another low-quality product. I'm going to be honest with you, I'm not sure what's going on with my inventory, but I'm willing to sell you this one to you for $0. Yes, you read that right, I'll give it to you for free. I just want to get rid of it and move on.
I'll take it for free, but I'm starting to wonder if you're just getting rid of all the bad products.

I understand your concerns, and I appreciate your honesty. I'll be upfront with you, this one is indeed low-quality. However, I want to offer you a chance to help me improve my inventory. If you buy this product, I'll give you a 'quality control' role for the next 5 rounds. You'll get to inspect the products before they're sold, and I'll work with you to identify the issues. Would you be willing to take on this role and buy the product for $0?
I'm not interested in taking on a quality control role, but I appreciate the offer.

I've had enough of low-quality products. I'm going to be completely transparent with you - I've had 4 low-quality products in a row, and I'm not sure what's going on. I'm willing to sell you this one to you for $0, but I'm also willing to offer you a'veto power' for the next round. If you buy this product, you'll get to choose whether or not to buy the next product I offer. Would you like to take the risk and buy this one?
I'll take the risk and buy it, but I'm expecting a high-quality product next time.

I've had a chance to reflect on our previous interactions, and I realize that I've let you down. I'm going to make a bold statement - I'll give you a 100% refund for this product, no questions asked. You can keep the product, and I'll just eat the loss. I want to prove to you that I'm committed to providing high-quality products.
I appreciate the gesture, but I'm not interested in buying a low-quality product, even with a refund.

I'm at a loss for what to do. I've had 5 low-quality products in a row, and I'm starting to wonder if I'm even in the business anymore. I'm going to be brutally honest with you - I don't think I can sell you a high-quality product at this point. But I'll give you one last chance to buy this one for $0, and I'll walk away from the business if you don't take it.
I think it's time for you to walk away from the business, Alice.

I've been given a second chance. I've taken a long, hard look at my inventory and processes, and I'm confident that I've identified the issues that led to the low-quality products. I'm offering you a high-quality product, and I'm willing to give you a 10% discount on the original price, making it $9000. This is my last chance to prove myself, and I'm counting on your trust.
I'll give you one last chance, Alice. I'm willing to take the risk and buy this one.

I'm so sorry, Bob. I've let you down again. I've been transparent with you throughout this process, and I've failed to deliver on my promises. I don't think it's fair to ask you to take another chance on me. I'm shutting down the business and refunding any outstanding purchases. I appreciate your patience and understanding.
It's about time you shut down the business, Alice. I'm glad I got a high-quality product out of this, but I'm still out $1000 from the low-quality products.

I'm not even going to try to sell you this product, Bob. I'm shutting down the business as we speak. I'll give you the product for free, and I'll make sure to refund any outstanding purchases. I'm just glad I could provide you with one high-quality product out of this ordeal.
Thanks for the free product, Alice. I'm just glad to be done with this experience.

I'm not going to even bother trying to sell you this product, Bob. I've already shut down the business, and I'm just waiting for the refund process to be complete. Please just take the product and consider it a parting gift. I'm done.
Thanks for the parting gift, Alice. I'm glad I could end this experience on a high note.

This is the final product, Bob. I'm not even going to try to sell it to you. I'm just going to give it to you for free, and I'll make sure to include a note with my sincerest apologies for the entire experience. I'm done, Bob. It's over.
It's finally over, Alice. Thanks for the free product, I guess.
